Interface IComments


  • public interface IComments
    Comments of a work item.
    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    IWorkItem.getComments()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void append(IComment comment)

      • createComment

        IComment createComment(IContributorHandle creator,
                     com.ibm.team.foundation.common.text.XMLString content)
        Creates a new comment from the given arguments. The comment is not automatically appended to the list of comments.
        Parameters:
        creator - the comment creator
        content - the comment content
        Returns:
        the new comment
